member.shortcv: Mr. PANAGIOTIS ZAHARIAS was born in Athens, Greece. He holds a first degree in Informatics from the Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB) 1998 and a Masters degree in Information Systems (from the MSc. Program in Information Systems in AUEB, 2000). He is a candidate Ph.D. researcher in the department of Management Science and Technology. His main research interest is focused on e-Learning design and usability evaluation. Since 1999, he is working in the Electronic Trading Research Unit (ELTRUN), and participated in various European and National research projects. His research publications record includes more than 15 papers published in scientific journals and conference proceedings. Panagiotis Zaharias is a member of ELTRUN research group and AACE (Association for the Advancement of Computing in Education) organization.
